org.apache.logging.log4j.core.parser

接口 TextLogEventParser

  • 所有超级接口:
    LogEventParser
    所有已知实现类:
    JsonLogEventParser, XmlLogEventParser, YamlLogEventParser

    public interface TextLogEventParser
extends LogEventParser
    Parses the output from a text based layout into instances of LogEvent.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      LogEvent parseFrom(String input)
      Parses a String, which is expected to contain exactly one log event.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.logging.log4j.core.parser.LogEventParser

        parseFrom, parseFrom

    • 方法详细资料

      • parseFrom

        LogEvent parseFrom(String input)
            throws ParseException
        Parses a String, which is expected to contain exactly one log event.
        参数:
        input - the string
        返回:
        the parsed LogEvent, never null.
        抛出:
        ParseException - if the input is malformed and cannot be parsed as a LogEvent
